Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

I have a problem with my own part created in Blender and exported using PartTools for Unity.

As in the topic it's a jet engine. Everything is all right until building in VAB and SPH, but when I want to fly my ship ,it doesn't move.

Please help me!

My engine model:

<iframe width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>

Whole part:

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/a9x0qfne4ts7pwx/Turbo%20Jet%20Engine%202.rar?dl=1](https://www.dropbox.com/s/a9x0qfne4ts7pwx/Turbo%20Jet%20Engine%202.rar?dl=1)

**[MOD - Moved to Modelling and Texturing Discussion]**

Have you defined a thrustTransform Unity GameObject for your engine model?

How can I do that?

- - - Updated - - -

Ok. I got it! This topic helped me so much [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/39863-Thrust-transform](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/39863-Thrust-transform). Thanks for reply man ;-)
